     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Sociology Subject Guide &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10544426">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10544426">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10544426">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10544426">
          <p href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=353961&amp;sid=2950149">
           For recommendations beyond the core resources listed on this page, use the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357827&amp;sid=2997102">
            Finding Background Information
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357827&amp;sid=2997104">
            Finding Articles
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357827&amp;sid=2997106">
            Finding Books
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357827&amp;sid=2997258">
            Finding Data &amp; Statistics
           </a>
           ,&nbsp;
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=353961&amp;sid=2950149">
           </a>
           and
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357827&amp;sid=2997113">
            Citations
           </a>
           tabs across the top.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10544426" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10268180">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10268180">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10268180">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10268180">
          <p>
           Find specific recommendations by course:
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10268180" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link18996717">
              <a id="link_18996717" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/americanethnicdiversity" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18996717,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18996717});">
               American Ethnic Diversity
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12485012">
              <a id="link_12485012" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/sociologyoffood" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12485012,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12485012});">
               Sociology of Food
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10545640">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10545640">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10545640">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Articles and Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10545640">
          <div id="boxatt10545640" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12812497">
              <a id="link_12812497" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12812497,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12812497}); ">
               Sociological Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12812496">
              <a id="link_12812496" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12812496,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines, with many sociology journals. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24636779">
              <a id="link_24636779" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24636779,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24636766}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10545654">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10545654">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10545654">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Background Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10545654">
          <p>
           To find more print and online reference books for general sociology, as well as specific subjects within or related to sociology, search Encompass Search or ask for help.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10545654" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12812506">
              <a id="link_12812506" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12812506,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for sociology. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12812507">
              <b>
               21st Century Sociology: A Reference Handbook
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 301 T971c vol. 1-2
               <br />
               Highlights the most important sociology topics, issues, questions, and debates in the 21st century.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12812510">
              <a id="link_12812510" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/2244366?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12812510,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12812510}); ">
               Annual Review of Sociology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Literature reviews providing summary and analysis of research in the field of sociology, published annually. Good for an overview of the state of research on a given topic. Full text is available online for 1975-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12812508">
              <b>
               Encyclopedia of Social Theory
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 301.01 E56o vol. 1-2 (Level B)
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10545678">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10545678">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10545678">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Citation Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10545678">
          <div id="boxatt10545678" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12812549">
              <b>
               Style Guide / American Sociological Association
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 808.0663 A512a 2010 (Level A)
               <br />
               The authoritative and complete manual for ASA Style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link14359928">
              <a id="link_14359928" href="http://www.buffalostate.edu/library/docs/asa.pdf" target="_blank" onclick="hit(14359928,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811289}); ">
               ASA Style (Buffalo State, SUNY)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of ASA Style formatting, in-text citations, and reference lists.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link14359931">
              <a id="link_14359931" href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/583/03/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(14359931,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 14359916}); ">
               Formatting in Sociology, ASA Style (Purdue University)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of ASA Style formatting, in-text citations, and reference lists.  Use the links of the left sidebar to navigate to sections.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12812555">
              <a id="link_12812555" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12812555,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Sociology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373526}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources."  Download instructions and help available on the site.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2926610" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
